TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebRequestHandler extends System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler

summary.span: 提供 Windows 市集應用程式或其他環境中所沒有的桌面特定功能。

span.span: Provides desktop-specific features not available to Windows Store apps or other environments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作使用傳輸處理常式將 HTTP 要求傳送至伺服器執行個體。This class implements a transport handler using instances to send HTTP requests to servers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowPipelining { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否將要求導送至網際網路資源。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to pipeline the request to the Internet resource.
Returns .

value.span: 如果要求應該要導送，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the request should be pipelined; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式使用可指出以管線連接喜好設定的屬性。An application uses the property to indicate a preference for pipelined connections. 當是`true`，應用程式建立的伺服器上支援這些以管線的連接。When is `true`, an application makes pipelined connections to the servers that support them.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Security::AuthenticationLevel AuthenticationLevel { System::Net::Security::AuthenticationLevel get(); void set(System::Net::Security::AuthenticationLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出用於這個要求的驗證和模擬等級。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication and impersonation used for this request.
Returns .
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相互驗證中，用戶端和伺服器都會出示建立其識別的認證。In mutual authentication, both the client and server present credentials to establish their identity. 和 與 Kerberos 驗證有關。The and values are relevant for Kerberos authentication. Kerberos 驗證可以直接支援，或在使用交涉安全性通訊協定時，用來選取實際的安全性通訊協定。Kerberos authentication can be supported directly, or can be used if the Negotiate security protocol is used to select the actual security protocol. 如需有關驗證通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[網際網路驗證](~/docs/framework/network-programming/internet-authentication.md)。For more information about authentication protocols, see [Internet Authentication](~/docs/framework/network-programming/internet-authentication.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Cache::RequestCachePolicy ^ CachePolicy { System::Net::Cache::RequestCachePolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Cache::RequestCachePolicy ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個要求的快取原則。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache policy for this request.
Returns .

value.span: 定義快取原則的 物件。

span.span: A object that defines a cache policy.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的快取原則和快取中要求之資源的存在會決定是否可以從快取中擷取的回應。The current cache policy and the presence of the requested resource in the cache determine whether a response can be retrieved from the cache. 使用快取回的應，通常可改善應用程式效能，但會有風險，在快取的回應不符合伺服器上的回應。Using cached responses usually improves application performance, but there is a risk that the response in the cache does not match the response on the server. 可以在 Machine.config 組態檔中，或藉由設定，指定預設快取原則屬性。The default cache policy can be specified in the Machine.config configuration file or by setting the property. 如果資源的回應資料流擷取和讀取資料流末端，則資源的複本只會加入至快取。A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream. 讓另一個要求相同的資源無法使用快取的副本，根據此要求的快取原則層級。So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientCertificates As X509CertificateCollection

summary.span: 取得或設定與這個要求關聯的安全憑證集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of security certificates that are associated with this request.
Returns .

value.span: 與這個要求相關聯的安全憑證的集合。

span.span: The collection of security certificates associated with this request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ContinueTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在上傳資料前，應用程式等待來自伺服器的 100-Continue 的時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, the application will wait for 100-continue from the server before uploading data.
Returns .

value.span: 在上傳資料前，應用程式等待來自伺服器的 100-Continue 的時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The amount of time, in milliseconds, the application will wait for 100-continue from the server before uploading data.
The default value is 350 milliseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Principal::TokenImpersonationLevel ImpersonationLevel { System::Security::Principal::TokenImpersonationLevel get(); void set(System::Security::Principal::TokenImpersonationLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前要求的模擬等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the impersonation level for the current request.
Returns .
The impersonation level for the request.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模擬等級會決定伺服器如何使用用戶端的認證。The impersonation level determines how the server can use the client's credentials.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxResponseHeadersLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定回應標頭的最大允許長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowed length of the response headers.
Returns .

value.span: 回應標頭的長度，以 KB (1024 位元組) 為單位。

span.span: The length, in kilobytes (1024 bytes), of the response headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回應標頭的長度包含回應狀態行和任何收到的 HTTP 通訊協定的一部分的額外控制字元。The length of the response header includes the response status line and any extra control characters that are received as part of HTTP protocol. 值為-1 表示沒有限制的回應標頭;值為 0 表示所有要求會都失敗。A value of -1 means no limit is imposed on the response headers; a value of 0 means that all requests fail. 如果未明確設定屬性，則預設值為屬性。If the property is not explicitly set, it defaults to the value of the property. 如果收到的回應標頭的長度超過值屬性，例外狀況會擲回存取回應時。If the length of the response header received exceeds the value of the property, an exception is thrown when the response is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReadWriteTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定寫入要求或從伺服器讀取回應時的逾時 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets a time-out in milliseconds when writing a request to or reading a response from a server.
Returns .

value.span: 寫入或讀取逾時前的毫秒數。預設值為 300,000 毫秒 (5 分鐘)。

span.span: The number of milliseconds before the writing or reading times out. The default value is 300,000 milliseconds (5 minutes).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Security::RemoteCertificateValidationCallback ^ ServerCertificateValidationCallback { System::Net::Security::RemoteCertificateValidationCallback ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Security::RemoteCertificateValidationCallback ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證伺服器憑證的回呼方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a callback method to validate the server certificate.
Returns .

value.span: 驗證伺服器憑證的回呼方法。

span.span: A callback method to validate the server certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`null`，將會使用標準的已知憑證授權單位驗證伺服器憑證。If the is `null`, the server certificate will be validated using standard well-known certificate authorities.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UnsafeAuthenticatedConnectionSharing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許高速 NTLM 驗證連接共用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allow high-speed NTLM-authenticated connection sharing.
Returns .

value.span: 保持已驗證連接於開啟的狀態，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to keep the authenticated connection open; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值是`false`，因而導致的要求完成之後關閉目前的連接。The default value for this property is `false`, which causes the current connection to be closed after a request is completed. 您的應用程式必須經過驗證順序，每一次，就會發出新的要求。如果這個屬性設定為`true`，在執行驗證之後用來擷取回應的連接仍為開啟。Your application must go through the authentication sequence every time it issues a new request.If this property is set to `true`, the connection used to retrieve the response remains open after the authentication has been performed. 在此情況下，其他要求，將此屬性設定為`true`可能使用的連接，而不需重新驗證。In this case, other requests that have this property set to `true` may use the connection without re-authenticating. 換句話說，如果使用者已經過驗證的連接，使用者 B 可能重複使用的連接。根據使用者 a 的認證可滿足使用者 B 的要求In other words, if a connection has been authenticated for user A, user B may reuse A's connection; user B's request is fulfilled based on the credentials of user A. > [!CAUTION] > 由於應用程式使用未經驗證的連接，您必須確定沒有系統管理的弱點可能會在您的系統時將此屬性設定為`true`。Because it is possible for an application to use the connection without being authenticated, you need to be sure that there is no administrative vulnerability in your system when setting this property to `true`. 如果您的應用程式將要求傳送多個使用者 （會模擬多個使用者帳戶） 需要驗證來保護資源，請勿將這個屬性設`true`除非您使用連線群組，如下所述。If your application sends requests for multiple users (impersonates multiple user accounts) and relies on authentication to protect resources, do not set this property to `true` unless you use connection groups as described below. 您可能要考慮啟用這項機制，如果您有效能問題，並使用整合式 Windows 驗證的 Web 伺服器上執行應用程式。You may want to consider enabling this mechanism if your are having performance problems and your application is running on a Web server with integrated Windows authentication. 啟用此設定會使系統的安全性風險。Enabling this setting opens the system to security risks. 如果您設定屬性`true`務必採取下列預防措施：If you set the property to `true` be sure to take the following precautions: - 為了避免可能的連接利用受保護的環境中執行應用程式。Run your application in a protected environment to help avoid possible connection exploits. 如果您要控制後端伺服器，或者您可以考慮關閉驗證持續性機制。If you control the back-end server, as an alternative you might consider turning off authentication persistence. 這會增加效能，以刻度更小，但是比較安全。This increases performance to a lesser degree, but it is safer. 如需詳細資訊，搜尋在 MSDN library 中的 AuthPersistence [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more details, search for AuthPersistence in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
